arts.ttl: Leipzig boss refuses to comment on under-fire Rose's future after latest disappointment
arts.sum: After another disappointing performance and result for RB Leipzig, Marcel Schäfer didn't want to comment on the growing pressure on head coach Marco Rose.

arts.ttl: Marco Rose comments on lethargic RB Leipzig: “We lost energy.”
arts.sum: RB Leipzig trainer Marco Rose saw his worst fears confirmed in Saturday's league loss to Mainz.

arts.ttl: Jonathan Burkardt and Nadiem Amiri complete Mainz turnaround to beat RB Leipzig
arts.sum: Jonathan Burkardt and Nadiem Amiri overturned a first-minute Xavi Simons finish to earn Mainz all three points away at RB Leipzig in a big result in the race for a top-four finish and UEFA Champions League qualification. Xavi Simons scored Leipzig's fastest home goal in Bundesliga history.

arts.ttl: Mainz carnival to parade Klopp float on Shrove Monday
arts.sum: Jurgen Klopp is one of the notable subjects to have been transformed into a styrofoam float for the Mainz carnival parade on Shrove Monday.

arts.ttl: Arsenal and Chelsea hope to use RB Leipzig crisis to seal Benjamin Sesko transfer
arts.sum: Arsenal and Chelsea both have RB Leipzig striker Benjamin Sesko on their radar ahead of the summer transfer window and the German club's Bundesliga struggles could bolster their chances of a marquee deal at the end of the season

arts.ttl: Marco Rose on squad rotations ahead of RB Leipzig-Mainz: “A few guys are very tired.”
arts.sum: Ahead of a weekend meeting with his former club FSV Mainz 05, RB Leipzig trainer Marco Rose spoke on squad rotations.

arts.ttl: RB Leipzig vs. Mainz 05 preview: Two top-four hopefuls face off
arts.sum: Two teams looking to secure Champions League qualification will face off when RB Leipzig welcome Mainz 05 to the Red Bull Arena on Saturday

arts.ttl: Mainz’s Bo Henriksen looks forward to Carnival: “I am my own costume.”
arts.sum: FSV Mainz 05 trainer Bo Henriksen was in a jovial mood ahead of his thriving side's weekend fixture against RB Leipzig.

arts.ttl: Are Mainz on course to finish in the top four and qualify for the UEFA Champions League for the first time?
arts.sum: Mainz currently sit in fifth with three wins from their last five, putting them in contention to secure UEFA Champions League football next season for the first time in their history. Burkardt isn’t the only Mainz attacker hitting new heights this season, with Paul Nebel also striking a career-best six goals already this term.

arts.ttl: Preview: RB Leipzig vs. Mainz 05 - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between RB Leipzig and Mainz 05, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
